labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: A marker is present, and only disappears when switching to the same server and back.
data.short_description: Sending a message and switching to another channel sometimes leaves the unread marker
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on a server that with an unread message marker, where only one channel has an unread message.  - Type a message - Switch to another server immediately
